Package org.drip.param.valuation

Class ValuationParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.param.valuation.ValuationParams
  • public class ValuationParams
extends java.lang.Object
    ValuationParams is the place-holder for the valuation parameters for a given product. It contains the valuation and the cash pay/settle dates, as well as the calendar. It also exposes a number of methods to construct standard valuation parameters.

    • Module = Product Core Module
    • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
    • Project = Product Cash Flow, Valuation, Market, Pricing, and Quoting Parameters
    • Package = Valuation Settlement and Valuation Customization Parameters
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
